headline: Corning (GLW) Valuation Check After Strong Multi‑Period Shareholder Returns
summary: What Corning’s Recent Performance Tells Investors Corning (GLW) has drawn fresh attention after a period of solid share performance, with the stock showing positive returns over the past week, month, and past 3 months, as well as over the past year. That price action now sits alongside reported annual revenue of US$14.9b and net income of US$1.4b, giving investors concrete numbers to compare with its recent market gains and longer term total returns.
